description: Details pursuant to Ref: 21/04782/FUL for construction management plan (4) drainage strategy (5) in respect of the provision of new build bottle store building and conveyor link building to the existing Blow Mould production facility, local amendments to trailer parking and yard circulation layouts to suit Bottle Store location, amendment to existing Blow Mould internal plant and external wall louvres and doors (between existing and proposed buildings), Provision of two number roof pods to facilitate safe access and escape into / from existing high level piped service areas.
site_name: Oakthorpe Park EstateOwen RoadLondonN13
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
